title: Qwen Image Serverless Worker
description: Serverless Runpod worker for Qwen/Qwen-Image with a drop-in Public Endpoint contract.

input.name: Hugging Face access token
input.description: Recommended to avoid anonymous rate limits when downloading Qwen/Qwen-Image.

input.name: Model repository
input.description: Hugging Face repo id to load (defaults to the official Qwen/Qwen-Image weights).

input.name: Default width
input.description: Fallback width (must be divisible by RESOLUTION_STEP).

input.name: Default height
input.description: Fallback height (must be divisible by RESOLUTION_STEP).

input.name: Resolution step
input.description: All width/height inputs must be divisible by this value.

input.name: Default inference steps
input.description: Steps to use when the request omits num_inference_steps (30 is a good quality default).

input.name: Default image format
input.description: Output container when the request does not include image_format.

input.name: Reported price per megapixel
input.description: Used only for the cost field in the handler response.

input.name: Maximum inference steps
input.description: Upper bound for num_inference_steps (50 for the base model).

input.name: Transformer single-file path
input.description: Optional path to a standalone Qwen transformer checkpoint (e.g., qwen_image_fp8_e4m3fn_scaled.safetensors).
